committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the making of clad strip from which slugs can be cut for use in coin operated machines and to prohibit misrepresentation as to proof and uncirculated coins.

summary.text: Prohibits the making of clad strip from which slugs can be cut for use in coin-operated machines and prohibits misrepresentation that packages of United States coins are proof mint or mint sets prepared and issued by a United States mint or assay office. Provides penalties for violations of this Act of a fine of not more than $1000, or imprisonment for not more than one year, or both. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 510)

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the making of clad strip from which slugs can be cut for use in coin operated machines and to prohibit misrepresentation as to proof and uncirculated coins.
